description:
When the light fades from the sky this compact light combo will help keep you seen. Bundling the KTV Drive Pro 300+ front light with the KTV Drive+ rear light, this package sets you up for low-light commutes. Each light uses a multiple LED array set into an engineered reflector that maximizes your visibility. USB-charging makes it easy to get rolling with full power.

  • Front light has 6 lighting modes, 3 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 300 lumens (3h), 200 lumens (4.5h), 100 lumens (8h), flash: 20 lumens (100h), day flash-300 (28h) and pulse–100 lumens (12h)
  • Rear light has 6 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 4 in flashing; steady: 20 lumens (2.5h), 5 lumens (10h), flash 1–20 lumens (9h), flash 2–5 lumens (45h), day flash-40 (12h) and pulse–20 lumens (5h)
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Precisely tuned optics focus the power of each light’s LEDs to maximize visibility
  • Cut-outs at the lens of the front light provide side illumination, keeping you seen from the side
  • Rear light features an integrated USB plug, no charging cable needed
  • Front light features a waterproof USC-C port for charging
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps. Rear light will fit aero seat posts
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne KTV Drive Pro 300/ KTV Drive Light Set
